ComicInfo.Summary: Grunge is stuck in the dimension of Sequential Art trying to rescue the Wizard from the Frenzy Beast. With help from a number of familiar cross-company characters and a pep talk by real life motivational guru Tony Robbins, Grunge finds the strength within himself to forsake his collection and rip the chromium covered comic he desires which destroys the Beast and sends him home to his friends.
ComicInfo.Writer: Brandon Choi,J. Scott Campbell,Jim Lee,Brandon Choi,J. Scott Campbell,Jim Lee
